data.comment: The first-half is under way at Serra Dourada - Goias kick-off to start the match.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Igor Jesus for Coritiba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In the minute 3, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Coritiba throw-in in Goias's half.
Corner awarded to Goias.
Rafael Moura (Goias) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 5, It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in Goias.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Goias.
Goias's Daniel Bessa breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Coritiba at Serra Dourada.
Free kick Goias.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Goias.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! Robson gives Coritiba a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 13, Great play from Sassa to set up the goal.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Important block from the Coritiba defence as Rafael Moura fires in a strike for Goias.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Goias.
Throw-in high up the field for Goias in Goiania.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 18, Goias are pushing forward but Jefferson's finish is wide of the goal.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In Goiania Coritiba's Robson is caught offside.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Goias in the half of Coritiba.
Goias to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
In the minute 22, Goias’s Vinicius Lopes is on his feet again at Serra Dourada.
Coritiba have a dangerous throw-in.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Goiania to check on Vinicius Lopes, who is grimacing with pain.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 23, Hugo Moura (Coritiba) has received a first yellow card.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Goias have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Coritiba are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Goiania, Robson of Coritiba is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Goias.
In the minute 28, Matheus Sales is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Coritiba apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Sassa. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
In the minute 30, Coritiba's Matheus Sales looks ok and returns to the pitch.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 32, Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vinicius Lopes (Goias) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Vinicius Lopes of Goias gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 33, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Coritiba push forward at Serra Dourada and Sassa gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Goias defence.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 37, William Matheus puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Coritiba.
Goias to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Mike is booked for the home team.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Caio Max Augusto Vieira waits before resuming play because Matheus Sales for Coritiba is still down.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Matheus Sales returns to the field for Coritiba after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 43, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Goias.
Coritiba surge into the attack at Serra Dourada but Robson’s header is off-target.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Goias capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Coritiba's half?
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Coritiba at Serra Dourada.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Goiania.
In the minute 45, Free kick Goias.
The first-half is over.
Goias are back in the match in Goiania. A Rafael Moura penalty has made the score 1-2.
At Serra Dourada, Rodolfo is shown a red card and sent off.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira blows to start the second-half. Coritiba with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Victor Andrade is replacing Mike for Goias at Serra Dourada.
The home team have replaced Breno with Miguel Figueira. This is the second substitution made today by Thiago Larghi.
Coritiba's Sassa is whistled for offside at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 48, Jorginho is making the team's first substitution at Serra Dourada with Matheus Galdezani replacing Matheus Sales.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 50, Goias attack but David Duarte's header doesn't find the target.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Coritiba at Serra Dourada.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 52, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Coritiba throw-in in Goias's half.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Goias to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
In the minute 55, Goias's Edilson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
Coritiba's Sassa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Goias defender.
In the minute 56, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Coritiba close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Corner awarded to Goias.
In the minute 59, Sassa is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
Free kick for Goias in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 60, Matheus Bueno (Coritiba) has received a yellow card from Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Sassa is back on his feet again.
Goias drives forward and Vinicius Lopes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 62, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Goias.
In the minute 64, Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
It seems as if Sassa is unable to continue. Natanael replaces him for the away team.
Jorginho (Coritiba) is making a third substitution, with Rhodolfo replacing Matheus Bueno.
In the minute 65, Edilson (Goias) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Victor Andrade for Goias has been booked by Caio Max Augusto Vieira and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
William Matheus has recovered and rejoins the match in Goiania.
In the minute 67, The match at Serra Dourada has been interrupted briefly for a check on William Matheus, who is down injured.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Vinicius Lopes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Goias.
Throw-in Goias.
Juan Pintado is replacing Edilson for Goias at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 70, Vinicius Lopes (Goias) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Coritiba defenders.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Goias's David Duarte attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goias drive upfield and Miguel Figueira gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
In the minute 72, Goias have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Goias.
In the minute 73, Miguel Figueira (Goias) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Hugo Moura of Coritiba gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 74, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Goias a goal kick.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Goias throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a throw-in for Goias, close to Coritiba's area.
Corner awarded to Goias.
In the minute 76, Daniel Villalva is replacing Vinicius Lopes for the home team.
Corner awarded to Goias.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Goias close to the penalty box.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, Free kick in a good position for Coritiba!
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Goias throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Goias's Rafael Vaz is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 81, Ignacio Jara grabs a goal to bring things level at 2-2 at Serra Dourada.
Goias make their fifth substitution with Ignacio Jara replacing Daniel Bessa.
Sabino scores an unfortunate own goal. This makes it 3-2 at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 85, Robson (Coritiba) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Luiz Henrique is on a sub for Hugo Moura for Coritiba.
In the minute 85, The away team replace Robson with Giovanni Augusto.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 89, Goias's Victor Andrade misses with an attempt on goal.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Free kick Coritiba.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Goias.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In Goiania, Luiz Henrique of Coritiba is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Coritiba have been awarded a penalty in Goiania...
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Goias to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-3.
Rafael Vaz (Goias) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Rafael Vaz (Goias) sees red and is sent off in Goiania!
Sabino scores from the spot to level the match at 3-3.
